description: Incremental tweak: slightly tighter liquidity buffer to reduce overdraft exposure while keeping simple urgency-based release. Symmetric policy for both banks. No collateral dynamics used (not needed given zero collateral cost so far).

on_true.description: Always release urgent or overdue payments to avoid any deadline/EOD risk.
Release when effective liquidity comfortably covers payment size.

on_false.description: Hold non‑urgent payment until liquidity improves, to limit overdraft cost.
For non‑urgent payments, require a liquidity buffer before releasing to reduce overdraft usage.

payment_tree.description: Urgent payments: release if close to deadline or already past it.

bank_tree.description: No explicit bank‑level budgeting logic; rely on payment‑level rules.

strategic_collateral_tree.description: Do not post or withdraw intraday collateral; not needed given no collateral cost observed.

end_of_tick_collateral_tree.description: Maintain current collateral at end of tick/day.
